gt: – Why did Microsoft buy Nokia's phone business? Maybe Microsoft should have tried to patch up its tried-and-true strategy of licensing its OS. Abortion: Justices may opt to revisit a Texas law that could reduce the state's abortion clinics from more than 40 to roughly 10.
